title: I Don't Have Any Missions
body: That's just it. Since the VS. event I've had absolutely no missions and I don't know if I'm supposed to have missions.

replies.body: We've had another set of missions for Kayn's release, but only if you had him unlocked.  Bookmark our [News](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/) page for announcements on future missions!
